attributes.action: Allow food delivery motorcycle parking in the pavement
attributes.additional_details: And also specially there are all red lines are in london area we don't have any place to park near by.that is one of the reasons our motorcycle are being stolen.we earn average 70 to 100 pound in a day .If we are given 130 pound of penalties just because we park in the pavement, that is too bad for us.it ruins our day..
attributes.background: We are food delivery riders.we work hard and help the economy keep growing. Many of us find difficulties to park our motorbike or scooter to pick up food or drop off food during busy hours of the day.we have given many penalties for the reason we parked in the pavement.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for local authorities and Transport for London.
